main event: A pilot reported observing a circular, metallic object moving at a constant speed south of Buenos Aires in November 1956.
interesting points: The object was approximately 3 minutes long and displayed no smoke or trail., The object was described as oval and appeared to be solid and metallic., It maneuvered almost at right angles without slowing down or stopping., The report considered the possibility of the object's movement being influenced by the Earth's magnetic field., The sighting was reported by a member of the Armed Forces, adding credibility to the observation.
witness description: Pilot of a DC-3 from the Indian Air Force
